description:
Natural mix for indoor and outdoor plants

Sunday Natural Moisture Potting Mix is ideal for potting or re-potting plants in containers. Specifically blended for a wide range of plant species, it helps soil retain vital moisture and provides optimized air flow to roots.

sections.faq:
What are the benefits of using this mix versus other garden soils?
Container plants need faster draining soils for healthy roots. Coir and perlite help excess water drain away and provide optimal airflow to keep soils from getting compact over time.
Does Natural Moisture Potting Mix contain fertilizer?
Natural Moisture Potting Mix contains ground limestone that will help add essential calcium and magnesium nutrients to the soil for optimal plant growth, but is not a substitute for fertilizer.
What is the difference between Natural Moisture Potting Mix and Natural Garden Mix?
Natural Moisture Potting Mix is ideal for potted plants and contains additional mediums such as coir and perlite to facilitate proper drainage to support healthy roots!
Will Natural Moisture Potting Mix require me to water less?
Natural Moisture Potting Mix retains similar moisture levels as other soilless mixes, watering frequency will vary depending on weather conditions and plant variety.
